amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 116-6 to add extended day programs to the child care services that can receive stipends.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Delgado.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
